${ModID}:Blaze.NAME: 烈焰
DESCRIPTION: #被动： At the end of turn, increase this Orbs amount by #b{0}. NL #yEvoke: Apply #b{1} #yIgnite to the enemy with highest HP.

${ModID}:Polar.NAME: 极寒
DESCRIPTION: #y被动： At the start of turn, apply #b{0} #yFrostbite to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Apply #b{1} #yFrostbite to ALL enemies.
